Description: Upper body sherd with turn to rim of Attic red-figured pottery krater; interior glazed black; exterior: reserved band at top of sherd; female figure to right (head with white dot in hair remaining; presumably carrying a fruit basket); in centre, hanging cloth with white fringe; at right, part of hand?
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1109)
